item.title: Using R to Create Custom Color Palettes for Tableau
item.author: bgstieber@gmail.com (Brad Stieber)
item.description: Have you ever wanted to define custom color palettes in Tableau, but didn’t know how? In this post, I’m going to walk through how we can use R to programmatically generate custom palettes in Tableau. Creating custom color palettes for Tableau has never been easier! This is going to be a short post, with just a little bit of R code. At the end of the post, you’ll see how to use R to generate custom color palettes to add to Tableau.
